lineTimestamps.originalText: I never felt so lonesome before
lineTimestamps.translatedText: 我从未感到如此孤单

lineTimestamps.originalText: My friend has quit me, he's gone for sure
lineTimestamps.translatedText: 我的朋友离开了我，真的走了

lineTimestamps.originalText: He broke my heart, for I loved him true
lineTimestamps.translatedText: 他伤了我的心，因为我真心爱他

lineTimestamps.originalText: So now I'm worried, lonesome, and blue
lineTimestamps.translatedText: 现在我忧心忡忡，孤单又忧郁

lineTimestamps.originalText: I've got the blues on my mind
lineTimestamps.translatedText: 满脑子都是忧伤

lineTimestamps.originalText: I just feel like crying all the time
lineTimestamps.translatedText: 我只想一直哭泣

lineTimestamps.originalText: Woke up this mornin', the day was dawnin'
lineTimestamps.translatedText: 今早醒来，天刚破晓

lineTimestamps.originalText: And I was feelin' all sad and blue
lineTimestamps.translatedText: 我感到满心悲伤与忧郁

lineTimestamps.originalText: I had nobody to tell my troubles to
lineTimestamps.translatedText: 没有一个人能倾诉我的烦恼

lineTimestamps.originalText: I felt so worried, I didn't know what to do
lineTimestamps.translatedText: 我心乱如麻，不知所措

lineTimestamps.originalText: But there's no use in grievin' because I'm leavin'
lineTimestamps.translatedText: 但悲伤无用，因为我要离开

lineTimestamps.originalText: I'm brokenhearted and Dixie bound
lineTimestamps.translatedText: 我心碎了，前往迪克西

lineTimestamps.originalText: I've been mistreated, ain't got no time to lose
lineTimestamps.translatedText: 我被伤害了，没有时间可浪费

lineTimestamps.originalText: My train is waitin', I got the down home blues
lineTimestamps.translatedText: 火车在等着我，我带着乡愁蓝调

lineTimestamps.originalText: Woke up this mornin', the day was dawnin'
lineTimestamps.translatedText: 今早醒来，天刚破晓

lineTimestamps.originalText: And I was feelin' all sad and blue, Lawd
lineTimestamps.translatedText: 我感到满心悲伤与忧郁，哦天

lineTimestamps.originalText: I had nobody to tell my troubles to
lineTimestamps.translatedText: 没有一个人能倾诉我的烦恼

lineTimestamps.originalText: And I felt so worried, I didn't know what to do
lineTimestamps.translatedText: 我心乱如麻，不知所措

lineTimestamps.originalText: But I said there's no use in grievin' 'cause I'm leavin'
lineTimestamps.translatedText: 但我说悲伤无用，因为我要离开

lineTimestamps.originalText: I'm brokenhearted and Dixie bound, Lawd
lineTimestamps.translatedText: 我心碎了，前往迪克西，哦天

lineTimestamps.originalText: I've been mistreated, ain't got no time to lose
lineTimestamps.translatedText: 我被伤害了，没有时间可浪费

lineTimestamps.originalText: And my train is waitin', and I got the down home blues
lineTimestamps.translatedText: 火车在等着我，我带着乡愁蓝调
